data.title: Recognition of Excellence
data.meta_description: University Rankings   ONU has a rich history of academic excellence, and we’re always evolving to meet society’s ever-changing needs. We’ve most recently been recognized for teaching quality, high graduation rates, commitment to volunteer service and, most impressively, providing a high return on investment for our graduates.
data.text:
Included on the “Best Colleges in Ohio” list by College Choice for academic reputation, student diversity and return on investment.

Ranked by PayScale among the top eight private universities, and in the top 16 overall in the state of Ohio, for return on investment.

Ranked No. 10 in the state of Ohio by PayScale for salary potential.

Career-guidance site Zippia ranked ONU No. 1 in Ohio on this site’s "Best College in Each State for Getting a Job in 2021." It’s listed at No. 3 nationally from a short list of 10 institutions.

Ranked the No. 1 Christian College in Ohio by the 2022 Best Colleges in America.

Ranked No. 14 by BestColleges.com in its list of “Best Colleges in Ohio.”

Ranked among the top 50 in BestColleges.com’s national “Best Small Town Colleges” rankings.

Included in MONEY's "2020 Best Colleges" list.
